mapper.select: SELECT DIET_NUM , TITLE , CON ,DIET_MAIN_PIC , HEADER_PIC , MEM_NUM FROM RECO_DIET
mapper.update: UPDATE RECO_DIET SET TITLE = #{title} , CON = #{con} , DIET_MAIN_PIC = #{pic2} , HEADER_PIC = #{pic} WHERE DIET_NUM = #{impic}
mapper.select: SELECT S.ID , S.CON , S.REG_D , S.MEM_NUM , S.REP_DIET_NUM FROM (SELECT M.ID , RD.CON , TO_CHAR(RD.REG_D, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_D ,RD.REP_DIET_NUM, RD.MEM_NUM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REP_DIET_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM MEM M INNER JOIN REP_DIET RD ON M.MEM_NUM = RD.MEM_NUM WHERE DEL_D IS NULL) S WHERE S.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REP_DIET
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REP_DIET(REP_DIET_NUM , DIET_NUM , MEM_NUM , CON) VALUES(REP_DIET_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{dietnum}, #{memnum} , #{replePlaceHolder})
mapper.delete: UPDATE REP_DIET SET DEL_D = SYSDATE WHERE REP_DIET_NUM = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE REP_DIET SET CON = #{replePlaceHolder} WHERE REP_DIET_NUM = #{no}
